lead_paragraph: The warning from Secretary of State John Kerry came on the same day that two hospitals in insurgent-held areas of the city were hit by airstrikes.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Neil MacFarquhar and Oleg Matsnev from Moscow, Anne Barnard and Hwaida Saad from Beirut, Somini Sengupta from the United Nations, and Yara Bishara and Rick Gladstone from New York.

headline.print_headline: Syria Talks Will End if Aleppo Bombing Continues, U.S. Tells Russia
headline.main: Syria Talks Will End if Aleppo Bombing Continues, U.S. Tells Russia

snippet: The warning from Secretary of State John Kerry came on the same day that two hospitals in insurgent-held areas of the city were hit by airstrikes....
abstract: Sec of State John Kerry tells Russian Foreign Min Sergey V Lavrov that talks with Russia about war in Syria and plans to target jihadists together will be scrapped unless Russian and Syrian forces cease bombing city of Aleppo; hundreds of civilians, many of them children, have been killed there in last week.
